names.english: soften the liver and preserve and protect yin decoction
names.commonEnglish: Soften the Liver and Preserve and Protect Yin Decoction

actions: Nourishes the Blood, astringes Yin and softens the Liver.
Relieves Heat, generates fluids and raises Spleen Yang.
Warms the Womb and warms and unblocks the Chong and Ren channels.
Tonifies the Liver and Kidneys, nourishes the Blood and nourishes Jing.
Tonifies Kidney Yin and astringes Jing.
Nourishes and tonifies Liver and Kidney Blood and Yin, benefits Jing and brightens the eyes.
Supplements the Liver, warms the Kidneys, fortifies Yang and astringes Jing.
Tonifies the Kidneys and strengthens Yang.
Dispels Wind, eliminates Dampness, invigorates the collaterals and invigorates the Blood.
Strengthens Yang, nourishes Yin, astringes Jing and urine, benefits the marrow, tonifies the Kidneys and Liver and improves vision.
